SplashScreen Displays splash screen
StatusBar Status bar to display Mouse Position,change zoom factor,change Dimension etc.
ToolBar This diplays the top toolbar with different buttons like
clear :- clear working space
background :- choose gradient background
open :- open saved image
save :- save current image
undo :- undo last change
redo :- redo last change
tools :- displays tools popup menu
palette :- displays color palette
slider1 and slider2 are not used
ToolsMenu The tools popup menu when tools button from the tool bar is pressed.
